org.sql: SELECT projects.* FROM projects WHERE (projects.status = 1 AND (SELECT 1 AS one FROM enabled_modules AS em WHERE em.project_id = projects.id AND em.name = 'issue_tracking') IS NOT NULL OR projects.id = 3) AND projects.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT project_id FROM projects_trackers)

rewrites.sql: SELECT projects.* FROM projects WHERE (projects.status = 1 AND (SELECT 1 AS one FROM enabled_modules AS em WHERE em.project_id = projects.id AND em.name = 'issue_tracking' LIMIT 1) IS NOT NULL OR projects.id = 3) AND projects.id IN (SELECT DISTINCT project_id FROM projects_trackers)
